entries.entry: Learned how to manipulate the DOM with querySelector
Learned what an object is and Object Oriented Programming
Learned about functions and how they are reusable code
Learned how to utilize the debugger to diagnose and resolve errors
Learned about API's, how to create an API and fetch data from that API
Learned about browser events (click, key press, mouse over, etc.)
Learned about splitting css and js into different files
Further developed Javascript skills while working in a group project. Helps re-enforce previous skills learned
Learned how to use import and export to link multiple scripts together, for a single JS file.
Covered the following methods that are available on any array in JS. forEach(), filter(), map(), find(), reduce(), sort()
